solution_line_template: To make {shirts_per_type} of the first type of shirt, they will need {shirts_per_type}*{buttons_type1}=<<{shirts_per_type}*{buttons_type1}={total_buttons_type1}>>{total_buttons_type1} buttons.
To make {shirts_per_type} of the second type of shirt, they will need {shirts_per_type}*{buttons_type2}=<<{shirts_per_type}*{buttons_type2}={total_buttons_type2}>>{total_buttons_type2} buttons.
